title: Shadowheart
content: from there. She can also be found by the crypt door on the beach after the Nautiloid crashes. Shadowheart is a High Half-Elf and a Trickery Domain Cleric, a class that can heal the party, and cast stealth and deception spells. Companions assist the player once they are in the party, and each companion has a unique backstory and traits.
